titleStmt.title: Christ the Christians choice. Or A sermon preached at the funerall of Mr John Cavvs one of the magistrates of the famous corporation of Plymouth. March the 29. Anno Dom. 1645. By Alexander Grosse. B.D. and pastor of Bridfoad.
titleStmt.author: Grosse, Alexander, 1596?-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.B. for Iohn Bartlet at the Gilt Cup under St. Augustines Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Gilt Cup under St. Augustines Gate
